content: दृ {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> (द्रियते, दृत; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} दिदरिषते) (rarely used by itself, usually found in combination with आ) {@--1@} To respect, honor, worship, reverence; द्वितीयाद्रियते सदा <ls>H. Pr. 7</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 3</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 55.</ls> {@--2@} To care for, mind; usually with न. {@--3@} To apply or devote oneself closely to, have regard for; भूरि श्रुतं शाश्वतमाद्रियंते <ls>Māl. 1. 5.</ls> {@--4@} To desire. {vII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (दृणोति) To hurt, kill.
